about_the_game:
A new era for fighting games begins!

The Open Beta of Street Fighter™ 6 allows players to experience certain game features in the Battle Hub.

Check the Open Beta Website for further details:
https://www.streetfighter.com/6/ob/

Open Beta Schedule
Planned for May 19, 2023 (Fri) 12:00am PDT - May 22, 2023 (Mon) 12:00am PDT

Notes
*Street Fighter™ 6 Open Beta cannot be accessed without an internet connection.
*A Capcom ID is required for Open Beta participation.
*For information on the services related to Capcom ID and how to use it, please visit the official Capcom ID website (https://cid.capcom.com/). Please note that there may be times when use of Capcom ID is age-restricted.
*World Tour and Fighting Ground are not available in this demo.
*Open Beta gameplay progress will not be carried to the retail version of game.
*The content of the Open Beta is still under development and may differ from the retail version of game.
detailed_description:
A new era for fighting games begins!

The Open Beta of Street Fighter™ 6 allows players to experience certain game features in the Battle Hub.

Check the Open Beta Website for further details:
https://www.streetfighter.com/6/ob/

Open Beta Schedule
Planned for May 19, 2023 (Fri) 12:00am PDT - May 22, 2023 (Mon) 12:00am PDT

Notes
*Street Fighter™ 6 Open Beta cannot be accessed without an internet connection.
*A Capcom ID is required for Open Beta participation.
*For information on the services related to Capcom ID and how to use it, please visit the official Capcom ID website (https://cid.capcom.com/). Please note that there may be times when use of Capcom ID is age-restricted.
*World Tour and Fighting Ground are not available in this demo.
*Open Beta gameplay progress will not be carried to the retail version of game.
*The content of the Open Beta is still under development and may differ from the retail version of game.
ext_user_account_notice: Capcom ID (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
name: Street Fighter™ 6 - Open Beta

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060 (VRAM 6GB) / Radeon RX 580 (VRAM 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: - The framerate may drop during graphic-intensive scenes. - As this is a title still in development, the system requirements are still subject to change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX2070 / Radeon RX 5700XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: - The framerate may drop during graphic-intensive scenes. - As this is a title still in development, the system requirements are still subject to change.
